description: Number T(n,k) of words w of length n such that each letter of the k-ary alphabet is used at least once and for every prefix z of w we have #(z,a_i) = 0 or #(z,a_i) >= #(z,a_j) for all j>i and #(z,a_i) counts the occurrences of the i-th letter in z; triangle T(n,k), n>=0, 0<=k<=n, read by rows.
